rules: Rule1: If the employee attends the cybersecurity fundamentals workshop, then the employee completes the cybersecurity fundamentals module
Rule2: If the employee violates the device usage policy, then the employee commits a serious violation
Rule3: Either the employee violates the device usage policy or the employee meets all requirements
Rule4: If the employee follows the device usage guidelines, then the employee does not violate the device usage policy
Rule5: Either the employee follows the device usage guidelines or the employee receives clearance from device restrictions
Rule6: If the employee receives clearance from device restrictions, then the employee does not violate the device usage policy
Rule7: If the employee exceeds quarterly performance targets, then should the employee not meet all requirements, the employee gets a promotion
Rule8: Either the employee exceeds quarterly performance targets or the employee achieves a project delivery milestone
Rule9: If the employee achieves a project delivery milestone, then the employee receives recognition as an outstanding contributor
Rule10: If the employee receives recognition as an outstanding contributor, then under the condition that the employee does not meet all requirements, the employee gets a promotion
Rule11: Either the employee fails the technical skills assessment or should the employee not meet all requirements, the employee completes the basic certification training
Rule12: If the manager approves the employee's transfer, then given that the employee does not meet all requirements, the employee transfers to another department
Rule13: If the HR department conducts an interview with the employee, then should the HR department review the employee's transfer request, the employee remains in their current department
Rule14: Either the HR department conducts an interview with the employee or the manager assesses the employee's fit for the new department

Rule15: If the manager assesses the employee's fit for the new department, then provided that the HR department reviews the employee's transfer request, the employee remains in their current department
Rule16: If the employee maintains their current position, then the employee completes the basic certification training
Rule17: If the employee renews their contract, then the employee maintains their current position
Rule18: Either the employee appeals a decision or if the employee passes the technical skills assessment, then the employee does not fail the technical skills assessment
Rule19: Either the employee accepts the outcome or the employee does not appeal a decision
Rule20: If the employee disputes an evaluation, then the employee provides evidence
Rule21: If the employee disputes an evaluation, then the employee does not undergo a review
Rule22: Either the employee disputes an evaluation or should the employee not meet all requirements, the employee receives a bonus
Rule23: If the employee passes the technical skills assessment, then the employee qualifies for advanced training
Rule24: Either the employee passes the technical skills assessment or the employee receives remedial training
Rule25: If the employee provides evidence, then the manager schedules a meeting with the employee
Rule26: If the manager schedules a meeting with the employee, then the employee undergoes a review
Rule27: If the employee faces disciplinary action, then the employee receives a warning
Rule28: If the employee commits a serious violation, then the employee undergoes investigation
Rule29: If the employee undergoes investigation, then the employee faces disciplinary action
Rule30: If the compliance department initiates an inquiry, then the employee record triggers an audit
Rule31: If the employee receives remedial training, then the employee does not fail the technical skills assessment
Rule32: If the employee demonstrates proficiency in the hands-on lab, then should the employee qualify for advanced training, the employee does not fail the technical skills assessment
Rule33: Either the employee demonstrates proficiency in the hands-on lab or the employee submits documentation of their experience portfolio

Rule34: If the employee submits documentation of their experience portfolio, then provided that the employee qualifies for advanced training, the employee does not fail the technical skills assessment
Rule35: If the employee completes the cybersecurity fundamentals module, then under the condition that the employee does not meet all requirements, the employee receives a bonus

Rule36: If it is not the case that the employee achieving a project delivery milestone results in the employee getting a promotion when not meeting all requirements, then the compliance department initiates an inquiry

Rule37: If it is not the case that the employee achieving a project delivery milestone causes the employee to get a promotion when not meeting all requirements, then the employee record does not trigger an audit
Rule38: If it is not the case that the employee requesting a transfer results in the manager approving the employee's transfer, then the HR department reviews the employee's transfer request
Rule39: If the employee does not meet all requirements, then the employee renews their contract
Rule40: If the employee does not meet all requirements, then the employee does not transfer to another department
Rule41: If the employee does not meet all requirements, then the employee does not receive a bonus
facts: Fact1: The employee attends the cybersecurity fundamentals workshop
Fact2: The employee requests a transfer
Fact3: The employee does not complete the basic certification training
Fact4: The employee does not get a promotion
Fact5: The employee does not remain in their current department
Fact6: The employee does not accept the outcome
Fact7: The employee does not receive a warning
